item.description:
Greetings incubators! 

Come on out to a double dose of laughs tomorrow. My troupe Rebels Without Applauze will be performing at the Somerville Theater in Davis Square at 8pm.  Tickets are only $5!!  So come out and laugh!  After the show is over we'll stick around in the theater (if possible) or head out into the square for some incubator games on the davis square common and some jp  licks ice cream!

Smile! And spread your energy all day!

 

Hope to see you Thursday.

Any questions or concerns let me know!

Peace, lightness, and laughter!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Buy a ticket and follow the signs!
item.why: my troupe is performing at Somerville Theater in Davis Square at 8pm! Tickets are only $5 and then we are going to rock out some open incubator games either inside the theater or outside in the square!
item.name: Change of plans! Come see a show and then an indoor/outdoor incubator!!
